General.Name: Dongguan Mentech Optical & Magnetic Co Ltd
General.Description: Dongguan Mentech Optical & Magnetic Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells magnetic components, optical modules/optics, and power supplies in China and internationally. The company offers optical transceivers and components; magnetic components, such as telecommunication and power magnetic components; energy equipment for networking infrastructure; and consumer power supply products, including power modules for telecom, chargers, intelligent fast chargers, etc. Its products are used in the network access, backbone, metro, fiber optic switch, fiber optic transceiver, digital television, optical communication, motherboard, network switch, router, set-top box, and network data communication industries. Dongguan Mentech Optical & Magnetic Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.
